attributes.action: Make Stockholm syndrome illegal and carry a life sentence
attributes.additional_details: There are many cases of domestic violence mental abuse emotional torture and this has to be recognised
attributes.background: Stockholm syndrome is the worst form of human violation as it is a very long lasting possibly forever form of mental abuse it should be punishable accordingly.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do - Stockholm Syndrome is something that victims may suffer from, so we're not sure how you want this to be made illegal. You can read more here:

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/magazine-22447726

Emotional abuse is already illegal and can be considered as domestic violence and abuse. You can find out more here

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/family/gender-violence/domestic-violence-and-abuse/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
